**Description**
Clearly describe the bug you observed.

**Platform, Game version, and Mod Version**
Enter your platform (i.e. Windows, Mac, Linux), the Vintage Story version you were playing, and version of RPCI that was being used.

**How to Reproduce**
List any steps that you found caused the issue.

**Screenshots**
Please add any screenshots that might help identify the issue, if applicable.

**Logs**
 If there are any instances of errors or crashes logged in your games Logs folder, please add them here. Full log files are too long for this field. If you want to send a full log, please upload them somewhere else (like Pastebin) and put the link here instead.
